**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 360 4.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Bloodline** [Imperial](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=9) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Area** 30-foot cone --- A spray of rainbow light beams cascades from your open hand. Each creature in the area must roll 1d8 on the table below to see which beam affects it, then attempt a saving throw of the indicated type. The table notes any additional traits that apply to each type of ray. If a creature is struck by multiple beams, it uses the same d20 result for all its saving throws. For all rays, a successful saving throw negates the effect for that creature. ## Prismatic Spray
**1d8****Color****Save****Effects (Traits)**
1RedReflex50 fire damage ([fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72))
2OrangeReflex60 acid damage ([acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3))
3YellowReflex70 electricity damage ([electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56))
4GreenFortitude30 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for 1 minute ([poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126))
5BlueFortitudeAffected as if by [_flesh to stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=123)
6IndigoWill[Confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5), as the [_warp mind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=369) spell ([mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106))
7VioletWill[Slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 minute; if a critical failure, sent to another plane, as [_plane shift_](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) ([teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156))
8Potent beam\-Affected by two beams - roll twice, rerolling any duplicates or results of 8
